title: Every Day with Rachael Ray
content:
I posted a challenge in [my latest blog entry](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040009/http:/typophile.com/node/15988). This one’s got a prize attached to it. any takers?

 [‹ smash tv record cover](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040009/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16021 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Johnny Walker label serif face - Adobe Serif substitution font {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040009/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16017 "Go to next forum topic")
author: paul d hunt

comments.content:
Paul, I’m positive the handwritten font for “Every” is Divine from T-26.

[http://www.t26.com/fonts/fontsearch.php?q=divine&ss=2](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040009/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/fontsearch.php?q=divine&ss=2 "http://www.t26.com/fonts/fontsearch.php?q=divine&ss=2")

I’m guessing on “Day” Apex Serif Bold?

[http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSerif/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040009/http:/vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSerif/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSerif/mudTyper+Weights/")

By the way, I’m amazed that nobody has tried to identify these - especially since you’re offering a prize! Very generous Paul! Here’s hoping that I get to start cookin’ with Rachel...

well i’ll agree we’re halfway there. the “Every” is definately a cleaned up Divine. I don’t think the serif is Apex tho...  
i might hafta give out 2 subscriptions! heh
nice! alright, you two, send me yer addresses we’ll see if they do international shipping... (i don’t know why they wouldn’t).

That’s the cowboy spirit!  
I wish I were good at type-ID, ’cause I like food a lot too!

hhp
